q1: Does Italy soccer differ than England soccer?
a1: No - it's all the same game played by the same rules
q2: Is soccer more popular in Italy than in England?
a2: No. Soccer is more popular in England than Italy.
q4: Considered as the lynchpin of the Italian side, 35-year-old ANDREA PIRLO has been likened in the past to an aging wine, because his effortless classiness on the pitch improves with age.
a4: If pirlo still played they’d have been at the world cup
